Verses: 1 ananiyaa Ennum Perulla Oruvanum, Avan Manaiviyaagiya Sappeeraalum Thangal Kaaniyaatchiyai Vitraargal.
2 than Manaivi Ariya Avan Kirayaththile Oru Pangai Vanjiththu Vaiththu, Oru Pangaik Konduvandhu, Apposthalarudaiya Paadhaththile Vaiththaan.
3 pedhuru Avanai Nokki: Ananiyaave Nilaththin Kirayaththil Oru Pangai Vanjiththuvaiththu, Parisuththa Aaviyinidaththil Poisollumpadi, Saaththaan Un Irudhayaththai Nirappinadhenna?

4 adhai Virkumunne Adhu Unnudaiyadhaayirukkavillaiyo? Adhai Vitrapinnum Adhin Kirayam Un Vasaththilirukkavillaiyo? Nee Un Irudhayaththile Ippadippatta Ennankondadhenna Nee Manusharidaththil Alla, Dhevanidaththil Poisonnaai Endraan.
5 ananiyaa Indha Vaarththaigalaik Ketkave, Vizhundhu Jeevanai Vittaan. Ivaigalaik Kelvippatta Yaavarukkum Migundha Bayamundaayitru.
6 vaalibar Ezhundhu, Avanaich Selaiyil Sutri, Veliye Eduththukkondupoi Adakkampanninaargal
7 erakkuraiya Moondru Mani Neraththukkuppinbu, Avanudaiya Manaivi Nadandhadhai Ariyaamal, Ulle Vandhaal.
8 pedhuru Avalai Nokki: Nilaththai Ivvalavukkuththaanaa Vitreergal, Enakkuch Sol Endraan. Aval: Aam, Ivvalavukkuththaan Endraal.

9 pedhuru Avalai Nokki: Karththarudaiya Aaviyaich Sodhikkiradharku Neengal Orumanappattadhenna? Idho, Un Purushanai Adakkampanninavargaludaiya Kaalgal Vaasarpadiyile Vandhirukkiradhu, Unnaiyum Veliye Kondupovaargal Endraan.

10 udane Aval Avanudaiya Paadhaththil Vizhundhu Jeevanai Vittaal. Vaalibar Ulle Vandhu, Aval Mariththupponadhaik Kandu, Avalai Veliye Eduththukkondupoi, Avaludaiya Purushanandaiyile Adakkampanninaargal.
11 sabaiyaarellaarukkum, Ivaigalaik Kelvippatta Matra Yaavarukkum, Migundha Bayamundaayitru.
12 apposthalarudaiya Kaigalinaale Anega Adaiyaalangalum Arpudhangalum Janangalukkulle Seyyappattadhu. Ellaarum Orumanappattu Saalomonudaiya Mandapaththil Irundhaargal.
13 matravargalil Oruvarum Avargaludane Serath Thuniyavillai. Aagilum Janangal Avargalai Menmaippaduththinaargal.
14 thiralaana Purushargalum Sthireegalum Visuvaasamullavargalaagik Karththaridaththil Adhigamadhigamaaich Serkkappattaargal.
15 piniyaaligalaip Padukkaigalin Melum Kattilgalinmelum Kidaththi, Nadandhupogaiyil Avanudaiya Nizhalaagilum Avargalil Silarmel Padumpadikku Avargalai Veliye Veedhigalil Konduvandhu Vaiththaargal.
16 sutruppattanangalilumirundhu Thiralaana Janangal Piniyaaligalaiyum Asuththa Aavigalaal Vaadhikkappattavargalaiyum Erusalemukkuk Konduvandhaargal; Avargalellaarum Gunamaakkappattaargal.
17 appozhudhu Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Avanudanekooda Irundha Sadhuseya Samayaththaaranaivarum Ezhumbi, Poraamaiyinaal Niraindhu,
18 apposthalargalaip Pidiththu, Podhuvaana Siraichchaalaiyile Vaiththaargal.
19 karththarudaiya Thoodhan Raaththiriyile Siraichchaalaiyin Kadhavugalaith Thirandhu, Avargalai Veliye Konduvandhu:
20 neengal Poi, Dhevaalayaththile Nindru, Indha Jeevavaarththaigal Ellaavatraiyum Janangalukkuch Sollungal Endraan.

21 avargal Adhaikkettu, Adhigaalame Dhevaalayaththil Piravesiththup Podhagampanninaargal. Piradhaana Aasaariyanum Avanudanekooda Irundhavargalum Vandhu, Aalosanai Sangaththaaraiyum Isravel Buththirarin Moopparellaaraiyum Varavazhaiththu Apposthalargalaik Konduvarumpadi Siraichchaalaikkuch Sevagarai Anuppinaargal.
22 sevagar Poi, Siraichchaalaiyile Avargalaik Kaanaamal, Thirumbivandhu:
23 siraichchaalai Migundha Baththiramaaip Poottappattirukkavum, Kaavarkaarar Veliye Kadhavugalukkumun Nirkavum Kandom; Thirandhapozhudho Ulle Oruvaraiyum Kaanom Endru Ariviththaargal.
24 indhach Seydhiyai Aasaariyanum Dhevaalayaththaik Kaakkira Senaiththalaivanum Piradhaana Aasaariyargalum Kettapozhudhu, Idhennamaai Mudiyumo Endru, Avargalaik Kuriththuk Kalakkamadaindhaargal.
25 appozhudhu Oruvan Vandhu: Idho, Neengal Kaavalil Vaiththa Manushar Dhevaalayaththil Nindru Janangalukkup Podhagampannugiraargal Endru Avargalukku Ariviththaan.
26 udane Senaiththalaivan Sevagarodekoodap Poi, Janangal Kallerivaargal Endru Bayandhadhinaal, Balavandhampannaamal Avargalai Azhaiththukkonduvandhaan.
27 appadi Avargalai Azhaiththukkondu, Aalosanai Sangaththukku Munbaaga Niruththinaargal Appozhudhu Piradhaana Aasaariyan Avargalai Nokki:

28 neengal Andha Naamaththaikkuriththup Podhagampannakkoodaadhendru Naangal Ungalukku Urudhiyaaik Kattalaiyidavillaiyaa. Appadiyirundhum, Idho, Erusalemai Ungal Podhagaththinaale Nirappi, Andha Manushanudaiya Raththappazhiyai Engalmel Sumaththavendumendrirukkireergal Endru Sonnaan.
29 adharkup Pedhuruvum Matra Apposthalarum: Manusharukkuk Keezhppadigiradhaippaarkkilum Dhevanukkuk Keezhppadikiradhe Avasiyamaayirukkiradhu.
30 neengal Maraththile Thookkik Kolaiseydha Yesuvai Nammudaiya Pidhaakkalin Dhevan Ezhuppi,
31 isravelukku Mananthirumbudhalaiyum Paavamannippaiyum Arulugiradharkaaga, Avarai Adhibadhiyaagavum Ratchagaraagavum Thamadhu Valadhukaraththinaale Uyarththinaar.
32 indhach Sangadhigalaikkuriththu Naangal Avarukkuch Saatchigalaayirukkirom. Dhevan Thamakkuk Keezhppadigiravargalukkuth Thandharulina Parisuththa Aaviyum Saatchi Endraargal
33 adhai Avargal Kettapozhudhu, Moorkkamadaindhu, Avargalaik Kolaiseyyumpadikku Yosanaipanninaargal.
34 appozhudhu Sagala Janangalaalum Ganampetra Niyaayasaasthiriyaagiya Kamaaliyel Ennum Perkonda Oru Pariseyan Aalosanai Sangaththil Ezhundhirundhu, Apposthalaraich Satruneram Veliye Kondupogachsolli,
35 sangaththaarai Nokki: Isravelare, Indha Manusharukku Neengal Seyyappogiradhaikkuriththu Echcharikkaiyaayirungal.

36 enendraal Innaatkalukkumunne Theyudhaas Enbavan Ezhumbi, Thannai Oru Periyavanaagap Paaraattinaan; Erakkuraiya Naanooruper Avanaich Serndhaargal; Avan Madindhuponaan; Avanai Nambina Anaivarum Sidhari, Avamaaipponaargal.

37 avanukkuppinbu, Kudimadhippin Naatkalile, Galileyanaagiya Yoodhaas Enbavan Ezhumpi, Thannaip Pinbatrumpadi Anega Janangalai Izhuththaan; Avanum Azhindhuponaan; Avanai Nambiyirundha Anaivarum Sidharadikkappattaargal.
38 ippozhudhu Naan Ungalukkuch Sollugiradhennavendraal, Indha Manusharukku Ondrunjseyyaamal Ivargalai Vittuvidungal Indha Yosanaiyum Indhak Kiriyaiyum Manusharaal Undaayirundhadhaanaal Azhindhupom:
39 dhevanaal Undaayirundhadheyaanaal, Adhai Ozhiththuvida Ungalaal Koodaadhu; Dhevanode Porseygiravargalaaik Kaanappadaadhapadikkup Paarungal Endraan.
40 appozhudhu Avargal Avanudaiya Yosanaikku Udanpattu, Apposthalarai Varavazhaiththu, Adiththu, Yesuvin Naamaththaik Kuriththup Pesakkoodaadhendru Kattalaiyittu, Avargalai Vidudhalaiyaakkinaargal.
41 avarudaiya Naamaththukkaagath Thaangal Avamaanamadaivadharkup Paaththiraraaga Ennappattapadiyinaal, Sandhoshamaai Aalosanai Sangaththaivittup Purappattuppoi,
42 dhinandhorum Dhevaalayaththileyum Veedugalileyum Idaividaamal Ubadhesampanni, Yesuve Kiristhuvendru Pirasangiththaargal.
